name: Ealaa Daw Ra
description:
Your goal: 

Ealaa Daw Ra is a single player FPS game where your objective is 

Keyboard : 

Z, Q, S, D – Move

Space – Jump

R – Restart Puzzle

Game Designers   Stanislas RADO - Rémy SCHLAEINTZAUER

Programmers  Luca SCHIFANO - Enzo GUT

Artist  Jeanne CABON

This game was developed in 3 days for the CHRISTMAS UNREAL JAM  event which was organized by the Institut de l’internet et du multimédia in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so please enjoy it.
